requirement.title: Take-Off
requirement.description: The airplane shall be launched by hand without an additional pilot.

requirement.title: Climbing
requirement.description: The airplane shall climb to a predefined altitude after launch and circle the launch site at this altitude.

requirement.title: Mission
requirement.description: The airplane shall be able to follow a predefined set of waypoints, consisting of latitude, longitude and altitude.

requirement.title: Landing
requirement.description: The airplane shall be able to follow land at a predefined landing position.

requirement.title: Range
requirement.description: The airplane minimum range of the aircraft shall be 100km

requirement.title: Error Handling
requirement.description: The airplane shall provide all information required for finding errors, both on the ground and when loitering.
